commands.command: add ns pbr sys_pbr_MGMT-ICMP ALLOW -srcIP = $SourceIP1$-$SourceIP2$ -destIP "!=" $SourceIP1$-$SourceIP2$ -nextHop $DestIP1$ -protocol ICMP -priority 100 -kernelstate SFAPPLIED61
